data.description: Adobe Reader LE 2.5 is the best PDF (Adobe Portable Document Format) viewer optimized for S60 5th Edition & Symbian 3 devices such as Nokia 5800/5530 XpressMusic, Nokia 97/mini, N8, C7, C6, 5230 & more.
data.name: Adobe Reader LE 2.5

data.description: Quickoffice® Pro includes 3 powerful applications in 1 office productivity tool with support for Microsoft® Word Documents, Excel Spreadsheets & PowerPoint Presentations.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro for Nokia (Symbian)

data.description: Enjoy the ability to CREATE, VIEW, and EDIT, Microsoft® Office files including Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and PowerPoint presentations. Conveniently ACCESS files remotely from your Google® Docs, Dropbox, Box.net, Huddle™, SugarSync, and MobileMe™ accounts or from your SD card with our enhanced Connected File Manager.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro Trial for Android

data.description: The ultimate Office solution for your Android phone, Nook, or Kindle Fire! With integrated access to remote services like Huddle, SugarSync, MobileMe, Dropbox, Google® Docs and Box.net, you can get the files you need from the cloud.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro for Android Phones

data.description:
Quickoffice Pro HD is the ultimate productivity app for your Android Tablet!

High-Definition Experience:

Productivity just got a face-lift. Our office suite is customized for the Android Tablet to provide the most elegant viewing experience yet to create an incredible high-definition iPad experience.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro HD for Android Tablets

data.description:
Quickoffice Lite for iPhone lets you view office documents (.DOC, .DOCX, .XLS, .XLSX, PPT, and .PPTX) for FREE! 

Please visit iTunes and search for Quickoffice Lite for more information!
data.name: Quickoffice Lite for iPhone

data.description: A great solution for editing documents on the go! SmartTouch™ Technology lets you quickly format text, numbers, paragraphs, backgrounds, and cells without opening and closing multiple menus.
data.name: Quickoffice for iPhone

data.description: The ultimate Office solution for your iPhone! With integrated access to remote services like Huddle, SugarSync, MobileMe, Dropbox, Google® Docs and Box.net, you can get the files you need from the cloud.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro for iPhone

data.description:
Quickoffice Pro HD is the ultimate productivity app for your iPad!

High-Definition Experience:

Productivity just got a face-lift. Our office suite is customized for iPad to provide the most elegant viewing experience yet to create an incredible high-definition iPad experience.
data.name: Quickoffice Pro HD for iPad
